mapper.select: select product_no,product_name,price from product where product_no=#{product_no}
SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM product a LEFT OUTER JOIN product_stock b on a.PRODUCT_NO = b.Product_NO ORDER BY a.product_no desc )
SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM product a LEFT OUTER JOIN product_stock b on a.PRODUCT_NO = b.Product_NO ORDER BY a.product_no desc ) WHERE sub_category=#{sub_category}
